name: Spooky Pumpkin Racer- Halloween Flying Cars Racing
name_original: Spooky Pumpkin Racer- Halloween Flying Cars Racing
description:
This Halloween witness a unique lantern-o-jack (carved glowing pumpkins) on a flying broom stick racing. Make your St Hallow’s Eve more enchanted with this magical race on the spooky hunted forest trail.

A unique Halloween Theme Flying Broom Car Gameplay
Press ‘play’ to enter the haunted forest for mirthful adventure. Fly over the mellow racing track towards the creepy ghost tunnel following by an invincible bridge with no bottom. Race your broom stick opponents on dark forest trails and smash to the finish line first.

Enchanted and Magical Racing Game for everyone
Celebrate this Celtic origin festival with this Halloween themed racing game with very different from the usual spooky makeup and costume tailor games. A futuristic racer guaranteed to be enjoyed by kids of all ages as well as adults.
Hop on your broom stick for an enchanting ride of the haunted forest.
